name: The Hero No More
description:
「Story」
This is a story of the birth of a hero.
The young swordsman acquired martial arts and started his journey. He had a great willing to become a hero.Accidentally, he saved a little girl whose family were killed by these so-called decent people.His mercy on the little girl got him in trouble. He was chased by these decent people and even the corrupt government.
Since he became a swordsman of some renown gradually, the main factions tried attracting him. He refused it and the siege of the annoyed factions began.In order to help the little girl take revenge and end it all, he took part in the general assembly. However, the enemy's intrigue defeated him.Facing the last offer of the enemy, the young swordsman declined it again...


「Features」
The game divides into two parts: plot and battle.
Battle serves the plot. That's why the battle experience is designed to be simple and casual.The only thing the players need to do is to see through enemy's attacks and perform the corresponding block and counter at right time.
As the story unfolds, the enemy's attacks will diversify and the difficulty of the operation for player
increases. But the player can still be relaxed and experience the whole story without the pressure of numerical value and upgrades.
publishers: Hainan Miwan Interaction Information Technology Co
